summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2565, for the improvement of Kenyon Street from a point 300 feet west of 1st Avenue South to 10th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by planking and bridging the same, under Ordinance No. 29835 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
